Todas las mañanas yo era estudiante.
Every morning i was a student.

Todos los días tú eras actor.
(tú) Every day you were an actor.

Él me dijo que nosotros éramos actores.
He told me that we were actors.

Todos los días usted era actor.
(usted) Every day you were an actor.

A esa hora ellas fueron dentistas.
At that hour they were dentists.

Todos los años ellas eran actrizes.
